thread.title: Calvin Harris, Taylor Swift’s boyfriend, looks buff in Emporio Armani | The
thread.title_full: Calvin Harris, Taylor Swift’s boyfriend, looks buff in Emporio Armani | The Advertiser

author: Nadia Salemme
title: Calvin Harris, Taylor Swift’s boyfriend, looks buff in Emporio Armani | The
text:
TAYLOR Swift is one lucky girl.
Her DJ boyfriend Calvin Harris looks seriously ripped wearing underwear (and nothing else) in his new Emporio Armani ad.
The Feels So Close producer, 31, went shirtless, wearing the fashion brand’s iconic briefs and showing off his impressive physique in the black and white ads.
Ripped ... Pray to God DJ Calvin Harris sizzles in the new Emporio Armani campaign. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
The Grammy winner captioned the image: “The new Emporio Armani Fall/Winter campaign @armani #CalvinHarrisforEA” on social media.
The Scottish hitmaker has undergone a serious image makeover over the past few years, going from lanky nerd to buff model.
Leather look ... Calvin Harris - clothed - in the new Emporio Armani camapign. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
Of course, he’s getting lots of attention for his personal life now that he’s dating Swift , 25.
Speaking to a New York radio station this month, Harris said he was “insanely happy” in his relationship with the I Knew You Were Trouble singer.
“It’s going absolutely fantastic,” Harris said.
“It’s interesting because obviously there’s different things written about it every day and even if we don’t do anything publicly for a while, someone will make something up.”
#CalvinHarrisforEA (Frame content direct link: https://www.instagram.com/p/5pTAPbt3Ja/embed .)
WATCH: Behind the scenes (Frame content direct link: https://www.instagram.com/p/5pvGyXzdKr/embed .)

Originally published as Calvin shows off hot bod in Armani ad
